key: Above The Cauldron: Chapel of the Architect
en: Above The Cauldron: Chapel of the Architect
zh: 大熔釜上方：建筑师礼拜堂。

key: Appearing in the Ruined Chapel at the end of Moss Grotto.
en: Appearing in the Ruined Chapel at the end of Moss Grotto.
zh: 出现在苔藓岩窟尽头的颓败教堂（苔穴）。

key: At the end of a long room in the Deep Docks
en: At the end of a long room in the Deep Docks
zh: 位于深坞一条长廊的尽头。

key: At the end of a parkour challenge at the top of the Whispering Vaults
en: At the end of a parkour challenge at the top of the Whispering Vaults
zh: 位于低语书库顶部跑酷挑战的终点。

key: At the end of a parkour section in the Slab behind a lock which requires the Key of Apostate
en: At the end of a parkour section in the Slab behind a lock which requires the Key of Apostate
zh: 位于石板地带一段需叛者之钥开锁的跑酷区域终点（罪石牢狱）。

key: At the top of Brightvein in Mount Fay
en: At the top of Brightvein in Mount Fay
zh: 位于菲伊山的冰晶脉窟顶部（费耶山）。

key: Balm for The Wounded quest reward
en: Balm for The Wounded quest reward
zh: “治疗伤者”心愿奖励（愈伤良方）。

key: Behind a breakable wall in High Halls
en: Behind a breakable wall in High Halls
zh: 在高庭的暗墙后方。

key: Behind a breakable wall in Weavenest Atla
en: Behind a breakable wall in Weavenest Atla
zh: 在阿特拉织巢的暗墙后方。

key: Behind a platforming sequence in the Abyss
en: Behind a platforming sequence in the Abyss
zh: 位于深渊的跑酷段之后。

key: Bellhart: Purchased from Frey after completing My Missing Courier wish
en: Bellhart: Purchased from Frey after completing My Missing Courier wish
zh: 钟城：完成“我遗失的信使”心愿后可向弗雷购入（失踪送货员）。

key: Blasted Steps far left
en: Blasted Steps far left
zh: 灼焰阶地最左侧（蚀阶）。

key: Blasted Steps: On a narrow platform above the sands
en: Blasted Steps: On a narrow platform above the sands
zh: 蚀阶：沙海上方的狭窄平台。

key: Bone Bottom: Complete Volatile Flintbeetles Wish
en: Bone Bottom: Complete Volatile Flintbeetles Wish
zh: 骸底镇：暴烈燧甲虫。

key: Bone Bottom: Purchased from Pebb for 500 Rosaries
en: Bone Bottom: Purchased from Pebb for 500 Rosaries
zh: 骸底镇：可向佩珀以 500 念珠购入。

key: Bottom right of the abyss
en: Bottom right of the abyss
zh: 位于深渊右下角。

key: Bottom Right of the Slab. On a corpse
en: Bottom Right of the Slab. On a corpse
zh: 石板地带右下角的尸体上（罪石牢狱）。

key: Bottom-right of the Cogwork Core
en: Bottom-right of the Cogwork Core
zh: 位于机枢核心右下角。

key: Bottom-right of the Deep Docks
en: Bottom-right of the Deep Docks
zh: 位于深坞右下角。

key: Can be fought in a hidden area in Shellwood, accessed through a breakable wall in the Grand Gate's lift shaft.
en: Can be fought in a hidden area in Shellwood, accessed through a breakable wall in the Grand Gate's lift shaft.
zh: 可在甲木林的隐藏区域挑战，需从巨扉圣门升降井的暗墙进入。

key: Can be found above cogwork core in The Cradle.
en: Can be found above cogwork core in The Cradle.
zh: 位于摇篮区齿轮核心上方（摇篮圣所）（机枢核心）。

key: Can be found across the pit from the Mosshome exit above Bone Bottom.
en: Can be found across the pit from the Mosshome exit above Bone Bottom.
zh: 骸底镇，从苔乡出口跨过深坑即可找到。

key: Can be found in a cave in the Slab after accepting a Grand Hunt quest in Songclave.
en: Can be found in a cave in the Slab after accepting a Grand Hunt quest in Songclave.
zh: 在圣歌盟地接下大狩猎任务后，可于石板地带的洞穴中找到（罪石牢狱）（狩王试炼）。

key: Can be found in Far Fields after promising the The Hidden Hunter Wish
en: Can be found in Far Fields after promising the The Hidden Hunter Wish
zh: 许下“隐匿猎手”心愿后可在远野找到（隐秘猎手）。

key: Can be found in Greymoor, in the basement of the large building in Craw Lake.
en: Can be found in Greymoor, in the basement of the large building in Craw Lake.
zh: 位于灰沼大型建筑——爬湖的地窖中（腐囊虫泽）。

key: Can be found in Mount Fay, in the same area as the bench halfway up the mountain.
en: Can be found in Mount Fay, in the same area as the bench halfway up the mountain.
zh: 位于菲伊山半山腰长椅所在的区域（费耶山）。

key: Can be found in the Blasted Steps, in a room west of the Bellway. He can only be fought during the Hero's Call wish.
en: Can be found in the Blasted Steps, in a room west of the Bellway. He can only be fought during the Hero's Call wish.
zh: 位于灼焰阶地钟道以西的房间，仅在“英雄的号召”心愿期间可战（蚀阶）（英勇救援）。

key: Can be found in the Coral Tower, Northeast in Sand of Karak.
en: Can be found in the Coral Tower, Northeast in Sand of Karak.
zh: 珊瑚尖塔。

key: Can be found in the extreme bottom left of Bonegrave behind a breakable wall, a sub area of Moss Grotto.
en: Can be found in the extreme bottom left of Bonegrave behind a breakable wall, a sub area of Moss Grotto.
zh: 位于苔藓岩窟分区骨冢的最左下角，需破坏暗墙（苔穴）。

key: Can be found in the lower area of the Slab, accessible after obtaining the Key of Apostate.
en: Can be found in the lower area of the Slab, accessible after obtaining the Key of Apostate.
zh: 位于石板地带下层，需取得叛者之钥方可进入（罪石牢狱）。

key: Can be found in the north-west area of the Sands of Karak.
en: Can be found in the north-west area of the Sands of Karak.
zh: 卡拉卡沙川。

key: Can be found in the northeast of Far Fields.
en: Can be found in the northeast of Far Fields.
zh: 位于远野的东北角。

key: Can be found in Voltnest within Sands of Karak.
en: Can be found in Voltnest within Sands of Karak.
zh: 卡拉卡沙川。

key: Can only be fought after beginning the Final Audience Wish, found next in south east of High halls.
en: Can only be fought after beginning the Final Audience Wish, found next in south east of High halls.
zh: 启动“最终觐见”心愿后方可挑战，随后会出现在高堂东南侧（高庭）。

key: Choral Chambers: At the end of a platforming challenge
en: Choral Chambers: At the end of a platforming challenge
zh: 圣咏殿：跑酷挑战的终点。

key: Choral Chambers: Enter the shaft from this section to turn on a fan, and this section to ride the air current to the top
en: Choral Chambers: Enter the shaft from this section to turn on a fan, and this section to ride the air current to the top
zh: 圣咏殿：从此段进入竖井启动风扇，再回到此处乘气流上升。

key: Cogwork Dancers are fought in the central area of Cogwork Core.
en: Cogwork Dancers are fought in the central area of Cogwork Core.
zh: 机枢舞者位于机枢核心中央区域。

key: Complete The Old Hearts wish
en: Complete The Old Hearts wish
zh: 古之心。

key: Cylinder auf Vaultkeeper in Whispering Vaults
en: Cylinder auf Vaultkeeper in Whispering Vaults
zh: 低语书库：柱厅门卫所在处。

key: Deep Docks: Held by a corpse at the bottom of a magma-filled area found behind the Breakable Wall
en: Deep Docks: Held by a corpse at the bottom of a magma-filled area found behind the Breakable Wall
zh: 深坞：破坏暗墙后，在充满熔浆区域底部的尸体上。

key: Deep Docks: In a room that can only be reached after defeating a nearby Arena Battle
en: Deep Docks: In a room that can only be reached after defeating a nearby Arena Battle
zh: 深坞：击败附近竞技战后才能进入的房间。

key: Deep Docks: Used for the Diving Bell
en: Deep Docks: Used for the Diving Bell
zh: 深坞：用于潜海钟。

key: Encounter her at the entrance of deep docks.
en: Encounter her at the entrance of deep docks.
zh: 在深坞入口处与她相遇。

key: Encountered at The Stage after traversing through the Whispering Vaults.
en: Encountered at The Stage after traversing through the Whispering Vaults.
zh: 穿过低语书库后会在舞台与其相遇（剧台）。

key: Encountered at The Stage,above Bellway Station.
en: Encountered at The Stage,above Bellway Station.
zh: 于舞台——也就是钟道站上方——与其相遇（剧台）。

key: Far fields secret Room. Reachable by Drifters Cloak
en: Far fields secret Room. Reachable by Drifters Cloak
zh: 远野密室，可借漂泊者斗篷滑翔抵达。

key: Far Fields: Complete Seamstress Wish Flexile Spines
en: Far Fields: Complete Seamstress Wish Flexile Spines
zh: 远野：完成裁缝心愿“柔脊”（柔韧棘芯）。

key: Far Fields: Hidden parkour path to the right of far fields bellway
en: Far Fields: Hidden parkour path to the right of far fields bellway
zh: 远野：钟道右侧的隐藏跑酷路线。

key: Far Fields: Pilgrims Rest, purchased from Mort for 150 Rosaries
en: Far Fields: Pilgrims Rest, purchased from Mort for 150 Rosaries
zh: 远野朝圣者之憩：可向莫特以 150 念珠购入。

key: Far Fields: Pilgrims Rest, purchased from Mort for 160 Rosaries
en: Far Fields: Pilgrims Rest, purchased from Mort for 160 Rosaries
zh: 远野朝圣者之憩：可向莫特以 160 念珠购入。

key: Far Fields: Pilgrims Rest, purchased from Mort for 220 Rosaries
en: Far Fields: Pilgrims Rest, purchased from Mort for 220 Rosaries
zh: 远野朝圣者之憩：可向莫特以 220 念珠购入。

key: Far Fields: Watch out for the pressure plate trap!
en: Far Fields: Watch out for the pressure plate trap!
zh: 远野：留意压力板陷阱！

key: Garmond and Zaza
en: Garmond and Zaza
zh: & 扎扎

key: Go East of Bellhart after completing Trail's End and hitting the ring as you enter the Greymoor area
en: Go East of Bellhart after completing Trail's End and hitting the ring as you enter the Greymoor area
zh: 完成“旅途尽头”并在进入灰沼时敲响铃环后，从钟城向东前进（终迹）。

key: Grand Bellway, behind a breakable wall above the bellway station
en: Grand Bellway, behind a breakable wall above the bellway station
zh: 大钟道站上方的暗墙后（圣堡钟道）。

key: Greymoore: Inside Halfway Home
en: Greymoore: Inside Halfway Home
zh: 灰沼：位于半途之家内部（中途酒馆）。

key: In a room at the top of the Exhaust Organ, which acts as an alternative entrance to the Citadel, skipping the Last Judge boss.
en: In a room at the top of the Exhaust Organ, which acts as an alternative entrance to the Citadel, skipping the Last Judge boss.
zh: 在排气风琴顶部的房间内，可作为绕开末代裁判、圣堡（废鸣管风琴）。

key: In a secret room above Bone Bottom. Easiest to reach wit Drifters Cloak and floating down from above.
en: In a secret room above Bone Bottom. Easiest to reach wit Drifters Cloak and floating down from above.
zh: 在骸底镇上方的密室，最简单的方式是穿着漂泊者斗篷自上空滑翔降落。

key: In an earlier room in the Deep Docks.
en: In an earlier room in the Deep Docks.
zh: 位于深坞稍前方的房间。

key: In The Cauldron (right side from Underworks
en: In The Cauldron (right side from Underworks
zh: 大熔釜：位于下厂区右侧入口。

key: In the northwest section of the Blasted Steps, Hornet encounters a room filled with pinkish conch shells.
en: In the northwest section of the Blasted Steps, Hornet encounters a room filled with pinkish conch shells.
zh: 在灼焰阶地西北区域，黄蜂会遇到一间堆满粉色螺壳的房间（蚀阶）。

key: In the Slab, top of a frosty section to the left
en: In the Slab, top of a frosty section to the left
zh: 石板地带：冰霜区左侧顶部（罪石牢狱）。

key: Inside the Exhaust Organ, there is a room with a silk refill spindle. Go left from there to access it.
en: Inside the Exhaust Organ, there is a room with a silk refill spindle. Go left from there to access it.
zh: 排气风琴内部有一间丝线补充纺锤室，从那里向左前进即可抵达（废鸣管风琴）。

key: Left of the Cogwork Core
en: Left of the Cogwork Core
zh: 位于机枢核心左侧。

key: Left of the toll bench in Mount Fay
en: Left of the toll bench in Mount Fay
zh: 菲伊山通行长椅左侧（费耶山）。

key: Left part of the Blasted Steps
en: Left part of the Blasted Steps
zh: 灼焰阶地左侧区域（蚀阶）。

key: Located in The Abyss, under the vast Void Ocean that lies within.
en: Located in The Abyss, under the vast Void Ocean that lies within.
zh: 位于深渊之内、那片虚海之下。

key: Moss Grotto: In a tunnel above the Lore Tablet, Silk Soar required
en: Moss Grotto: In a tunnel above the Lore Tablet, Silk Soar required
zh: 苔穴：铭文石碑上方的通道，需要织丝上升。

key: Mount Fay: Top of Room in the middle
en: Mount Fay: Top of Room in the middle
zh: 费耶山：中央房间顶部。

key: Near the Deep Docks entrance in the Marrow
en: Near the Deep Docks entrance in the Marrow
zh: 髓质穹顶中靠近深坞入口处（髓骨洞窟）。

key: North east of Sinner's road in the kitchen.
en: North east of Sinner's road in the kitchen.
zh: 位于罪途中东北侧的厨房。

key: Psalm Cylinder - High Halls
en: Psalm Cylinder - High Halls
zh: 圣咏圆柱——高庭。

key: Psalm Cylinder - Whispering Vaults
en: Psalm Cylinder - Whispering Vaults
zh: 圣咏圆柱——低语书库。
完成任务“我遗失的信使”后可向弗雷购入（失踪送货员）。

key: Purchased from Grindle in Blasted Steps
en: Purchased from Grindle in Blasted Steps
zh: 可在灼焰阶地向格林德尔购买（蚀阶）。

key: Purchased from Jubilana after saving her as part of the The Lost Merchant quest
en: Purchased from Jubilana after saving her as part of the The Lost Merchant quest
zh: 在完成“失踪商贩”心愿救出朱比拉娜后可购买（再寻商贾）。

key: Putrified Ducts: Bottom-left: Inside a cage. Hit it a few times to get the key out
en: Putrified Ducts: Bottom-left: Inside a cage. Hit it a few times to get the key out
zh: 腐朽管道：左下角的牢笼内，多次击打可取得钥匙（腐殖渠）。

key: Reward for the Dark Hearts quest
en: Reward for the Dark Hearts quest
zh: 暗蚀之心。

key: Reward for the Fastest in Pharloom quest
en: Reward for the Fastest in Pharloom quest
zh: “纺络最快”心愿奖励（纺络竞速冠军）。

key: Reward for the Hidden Hunter quest
en: Reward for the Hidden Hunter quest
zh: 隐秘猎手。

key: Reward for the Savage Beastfly quest obtainable in Bellhart
en: Reward for the Savage Beastfly quest obtainable in Bellhart
zh: 钟城的“凶蛾狩猎”心愿奖励（暴怒兽蝇）。

key: Right of the Wisp Thicket
en: Right of the Wisp Thicket
zh: 位于灵光密林右侧（火灵竹丛）。

key: Sands of Karak: Far-right, held by a corpse sitting on the bench
en: Sands of Karak: Far-right, held by a corpse sitting on the bench
zh: 卡拉卡沙川，长椅上的尸体持有。

key: Sands of Karak: Held by a corpse at the top of the area
en: Sands of Karak: Held by a corpse at the top of the area
zh: 卡拉卡沙川。

key: Sands of Karak: Secret area behind breakable wall
en: Sands of Karak: Secret area behind breakable wall
zh: 卡拉卡沙川：暗墙后的秘区。

key: Secret Room in Far Fields Weaver nest (Sprint Challange)
en: Secret Room in Far Fields Weaver nest (Sprint Challange)
zh: 远野织巢密室（冲刺挑战）。

key: Section behind a breakable wall on the left of the elevator shaft of the Grand Gate.
en: Section behind a breakable wall on the left of the elevator shaft of the Grand Gate.
zh: 位于巨扉圣门升降井左侧暗墙后的区域。

key: Skull Tyrant can be fought first in The Marrow(center dome).
en: Skull Tyrant can be fought first in The Marrow(center dome).
zh: 骷髅暴君最早可在髓质穹顶中央遭遇（髓骨洞窟）。

key: Sold by Grindle for 240 Rosaries (Blasted Steps)
en: Sold by Grindle for 240 Rosaries (Blasted Steps)
zh: 蚀阶：格林德尔以 240 念珠售卖。

key: Songclave: On a corpse at the edge of the area. Sold by Jubilana if you dont pick it up before completing The Wandering Merchant Wish. Unlocks the Locked Elevator in Whiteward
en: Songclave: On a corpse at the edge of the area. Sold by Jubilana if you dont pick it up before completing The Wandering Merchant Wish. Unlocks the Locked Elevator in Whiteward
zh: 圣歌盟地：区域边缘的尸体持有，若在完成“流浪商贩”心愿前未拾取，可由朱比拉娜代售；用于开启白愈厅的锁定升降机（商贾无踪）。

key: Take Twisted Bud to Greyroot, Complete Rite of Rebirth Wish, Complete Infestation Operation Wish
en: Take Twisted Bud to Greyroot, Complete Rite of Rebirth Wish, Complete Infestation Operation Wish
zh: 携带弯枝花蕾交给灰根，并完成“重生仪式”与“虫巢肃清”心愿（寄生手术）。

key: The Bell Beast can be found the very top of the Marrow.
en: The Bell Beast can be found the very top of the Marrow.
zh: 钟兽位于髓质穹顶最顶端（髓骨洞窟）（钟道兽）。

key: The Lost Merchant Wish completed
en: The Lost Merchant Wish completed
zh: 完成“失踪商贩”心愿（再寻商贾）。

key: The Slab: Above the lower bench
en: The Slab: Above the lower bench
zh: 石板地带：下方长椅上方（罪石牢狱）。

key: The Slab: At the edge of a room entered from above
en: The Slab: At the edge of a room entered from above
zh: 石板地带：从上方进入的房间边缘（罪石牢狱）。

key: The Slab: Dropped by the final enemy in a room entered from above
en: The Slab: Dropped by the final enemy in a room entered from above
zh: 石板地带：从上方进入的房间中最后一名敌人掉落（罪石牢狱）。

key: The Slab: In a small side-room at the edge of the area
en: The Slab: In a small side-room at the edge of the area
zh: 石板地带：区域边缘的小侧室内（罪石牢狱）。

key: The Slab: Inside the shortcut cave. Look out for a breakable wall as you climb a vertical space
en: The Slab: Inside the shortcut cave. Look out for a breakable wall as you climb a vertical space
zh: 石板地带：捷径洞窟内，攀爬竖井时注意暗墙（罪石牢狱）。

key: To the left of Deep Docks Bellway. In the corner of an area fill with lavafalls.
en: To the left of Deep Docks Bellway. In the corner of an area fill with lavafalls.
zh: 位于深坞钟道左侧，处在岩浆瀑布遍布的角落。

key: Top of Blasted Steps
en: Top of Blasted Steps
zh: 灼焰阶地顶部（蚀阶）。

key: Top of Mount Fay
en: Top of Mount Fay
zh: 菲伊山顶部（费耶山）。

key: Top of the Grand Gate room
en: Top of the Grand Gate room
zh: 巨扉圣门大厅顶部。

key: Top of the High Halls
en: Top of the High Halls
zh: 高庭顶部。

key: Top of Wisp Thicket Platform Challange
en: Top of Wisp Thicket Platform Challange
zh: 灵光密林平台挑战的顶部（火灵竹丛）。

key: Top Right of Songclave: Parkour Challange, Access throught Whispering Vaults
en: Top Right of Songclave: Parkour Challange, Access throught Whispering Vaults
zh: 圣歌盟地右上角：通过低语书库进入的跑酷挑战。

key: Underworks: Can be collected only by passing through Wisp Thicket area and traversing a room full of saws.
en: Underworks: Can be collected only by passing through Wisp Thicket area and traversing a room full of saws.
zh: 下层工区：需穿过灵光密林并通过布满锯片的房间才能取得（火灵竹丛）。

key: West corner of Wisp Thicket.
en: West corner of Wisp Thicket.
zh: 位于灵光密林西侧角落（火灵竹丛）。

key: Whispering Vaults: At the top of a tunnel
en: Whispering Vaults: At the top of a tunnel
zh: 低语书库：隧道顶部。

key: Whispering Vaults: Hit the box with a long track into its final position to reach this flea.
en: Whispering Vaults: Hit the box with a long track into its final position to reach this flea.
zh: 低语书库：击打带长轨道的箱子至终点位置后即可取得该跳蚤。

key: Within the Skull Cavern in the Far Fields
en: Within the Skull Cavern in the Far Fields
zh: 远野颅骨洞窟内部。

key: Purchased from Frey after completing the mission \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"My Missing Courier\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"
en: Purchased from Frey after completing the mission \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"My Missing Courier\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"
zh: 完成任务“我遗失的信使”后可向弗雷购入（失踪送货员）。

key: Purchased from Frey after completing the mission \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"My Missing Courier\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"
en: Purchased from Frey after completing the mission \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"My Missing Courier\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"
zh: 完成任务“我遗失的信使”后可向弗雷购入（失踪送货员）。

key: Purchased from Frey after completing the mission \\\\\\\"My Missing Courier\\\\\\\"
en: Purchased from Frey after completing the mission \\\\\\\"My Missing Courier\\\\\\\"
zh: 完成任务“我遗失的信使”后可向弗雷购入（失踪送货员）。
